subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: At 5 years old, Philip Stephen Martelli has become an imitator of, and an influence on, his grandfather, who saw his basketball team’s season end in the Atlantic 10 tournament.
snippet: At 5 years old, Philip Stephen Martelli has become an imitator of, and an influence on, his grandfather, who saw his basketball team’s season end in the Atlantic 10 tournament.
